title: Biker pulls up next to ex-girlfriend's wedding car and begs 'don't get married'

This is the moment a biker pulls up next to his ex-girlfriend's wedding car and reportedly begs her not to get married.

In the video, the biker can be seen speaking to the bride-to-be as she sits in her wedding dress in an antique car - about to marry the man she loves.

The biker drops to his knees and reportedly begs her not to get married as she's on the way to the chapel.

He even tries to kiss her at one point, prompting her to shove him away.

The bizarre incident took place in Medellin, Antioquia, north-western Colombia.

(Image: CEN)

(Image: CEN)

Onlookers can be heard saying "don't get married" and others shout "kiss, kiss".

However, local media report the bride left the scene in the car while the biker was left alone on his two-wheeler.

Many have commented on the video online.

(Image: CEN)

Rosibel Lopez Gomez said: "He lost his opportunity when he was with her, now let her marry in peace, sh**."

'Flor de primavera' added: "What a humiliating situation, ridiculous, nobody is forcing anybody to marry, whoever is getting married does it because they want to, it is nothing about confusion, everybody is responsible for their choices in life, the woman decided to get married, and this guy is humiliating a woman who does not love him anymore."

Neither the bride nor the biker have been named in reports.
description: Video footage shows the biker dropping down to his knees and trying to kiss the bride - who is on her way to the chapel to marry the man she loves
